title: Celebrate the Masters with 18% off this home golf simulator
description:
The Masters Tournament is returning to Augusta National Golf Club on the weekend of April 6, but you don’t have to wait that long to get into the spirit of golf season! To help you get warmed up to hit the links this spring, we’re offering the SwingLogic SLX MicroSim Home Golf MicroSimulator for a specially reduced price.

Now through 11:59 p.m. on March 15, you can grab this leading home simulator for 18% off at just $204.

The SLX MicroSim is a full 4K home golf simulator that has earned 4.4/5 stars on Amazon. Compared to other home simulators, the SLX MicroSim delivers lightning-quick speed with E6 Connect software, allowing you to experience 3D swing analysis as you golf at some of the world’s most famous courses. You can even play with your real golf clubs, using highly customizable calibration to get an extremely accurate reproduction of your swing from the comfort of home.

You don’t have to wait until spring to hit the links! Now through March 15, you can get the SwingLogic SLX MicroSim Home Golf MicroSimulator for 18% off $249 at just $204. You can also get a Basic Kit with no swing stick for 44% off $179 at just $99.99.
